Articles.Content:
This is Captain Bsohi reporting to duty.

I\'ve flown the KSP simulator training for a long time, and it\'s nice to finally pay my licensing fee (pre-order) and finally meet my fellow pilots (sign up at forums lol).

Would love to meet as many of you as possible, and I look forward to seeing you among the stars (and the fiery wreckage of my spacecrafts remains!).

CAPTAIN BSOHI!

Welcome to the team! We\'ve been expecting you!

The launch facility is over there and..oh..what\'s this? You\'ve pre-ordered? You want to meet new people!

*GASP*

All kidding aside, WELCOME TO THE FORUMS!

So happy to have you here.

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

This is Captain Bsohi reporting to duty.

I\'ve flown the KSP simulator training for a long time, and it\'s nice to finally pay my licensing fee (pre-order) and finally meet my fellow pilots (sign up at forums lol).

Would love to meet as many of you as possible, and I look forward to seeing you among the stars (and the fiery wreckage of my spacecrafts remains!).

Welcome Bsohi, and if I was a developer, I would be saying thanks for pre-ordering (but sadly I\'m not). We have a friendly community, and I am sure you will enjoy yourself playing this remarkable game.

Forever Here

GroundHOG2010

Welcome Bsohi, and if I was a developer, I would be saying thanks for pre-ordering (but sadly I\'m not). We have a friendly community, and I am sure you will enjoy yourself playing this remarkable game.

Forever Here

GroundHOG2010

Well actually developer or not, his time and effort to pre-order is beneficial to the community since that is what drives the game and keeps it going.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome fellow engineer!

Lot\'s of good people here, cool moders, and tons of info.

May your ship fly straight and true, unlike mine. lols

thor
